alert.note: Alert for Irion; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 5:54PM CDT until May 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Tom Green County in west central Texas... Northeastern Irion County in west central Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 554 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Arden, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Tankersley around 615 PM CDT. San Angelo State Park and O.c. Fisher Reservoir around 620 PM CDT. Twin Buttes Reservoir around 625 PM CDT. Lake Nasworthy around 630 PM CDT. Goodfellow Air Force Base around 635 PM CDT. People near Lone Star Baseball Tournament should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
